text: Check this Code, if you get stuck in problem- (Using Windows + Py- 3.6 + Visual Studio)  import cv2 import numpy as np  cap = cv2.VideoCapture(0)   #Capture Video from the 1st WebCam fourcc = cv2.VideoWriter_fourcc(*"XVID") out = cv2.VideoWriter('output.avi',fourcc,20.0,(640,480))       #name of the output file, fourcc, number of frames per second, frame size  while cap.isOpened():       #checking whether the cap is initialized or not         #cap.read() will return the bool value, True- if the frame is read correctly     ret, frame = cap.read()     #reading video frame by frame     if ret == True:             #modifying the frame          gray = cv2.cvtColor(frame,cv2.COLOR_BGR2GRAY)       #converting the BGR color to the gray         out.write(frame)         cv2.imshow("frame",frame)         cv2.imshow("Grayframe",gray)          if cv2.waitKey(1) & 0xFF == ord("q"):       #waitKey(n)- where n defines the delay between per frames, if n<=0 it return the key press by the user             break     else:         break          cap.release() cv2.destroyAllWindows()     #destroy all the opened window and deallocated the memory out.release()
